cast.name: 范吉利斯·穆里基斯 Vangelis Mourikis
亚尼斯·伊科诺米季斯 Yannis Economides

writer.name: 尼科斯·帕纳尤托普洛斯 Nikos Panayotopoulos

introduction: A corrupt, Andrew, tries to flee the country after accidentally shooting his wife. His last resort for help: his estranged frocked brother, Nick. Together, they spend a whirlwind of a night, while Andrew burns all his bridges with the underworld: prostitution, human trafficking, drug dealing. On one hand, the priest tries to convince Andrew to surrender and accept responsibility for his actions. On the other, the cop tries to unload his family responsibilities to his brother Nick. This night is The Wake for their past and for Andrew's wife.
